name: openagenda
description: Display your OpenAgenda data on your WordPress site

scripts.build: npm run sass && npm run postcss && npm run terser && npm run make-pot
scripts.make-pot: wp i18n make-pot . languages/openagenda.pot --exclude="node_modules, svn, js"
scripts.postcss: postcss assets/css/style.css -o assets/css/style.min.css & postcss assets/css/leaflet.css -o assets/css/leaflet.min.css
scripts.terser: terser assets/js/customizer.js -o assets/js/customizer.min.js & terser assets/js/event-map.js -o assets/js/event-map.min.js & terser assets/js/main.js -o assets/js/main.min.js & terser assets/js/timings.js -o assets/js/timings.min.js & terser assets/js/widgets.js -o assets/js/widgets.min.js

author: Vincent Dubroeucq
